text: Love 'Em and Leave 'Em may refer to: * Love 'Em and Leave 'Em (album), a demo album by Roxx Gang * Love 'Em and Leave 'Em (film), a 1926 silent American comedy-drama film * Love 'Em and Leave 'Em (SMBSS episode), an episode of The Super Mario Bros. Super Show! * "Love 'Em and Leave 'Em", a song from Rock and Roll Over, the fifth studio album by the American rock band Kiss.
title: Love 'Em and Leave 'Em
